document.full_text: north korea's secretive leader kim jong-il toured east china monday, continuing a visit that suggests he is taking fresh interest in the success of reforms in asia's biggest economy and his isolated country's only major benefactor.
document.title: kim jong-il tours east china
lines_and_colors: north korea's secretive leader kim jong-il toured east china monday, continuing a visit that suggests he is taking fresh interest in the success of reforms in asia's biggest economy and his isolated country's only major benefactor.
